column2: unblocks specified players chat and voice (/unblock player_name)
shows profile of specified player (/profile player_name)
reply to last person who whispered to you (/r message)
send private message to specified player (/pm player_name message)
unmutes specified players chat and voice for current session (/unmute player_name)
chat to players in current team (/team message)
shows all available chat shortcut commands for current game area (/help)
blocks specified players chat and voice permanently until unblocked (/block player_name)
mutes specified players chat and voice for current session (/mute player_name)
